attributes.action: Stop Queens Park Rangers Football Club being relelgated!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Quite simple, after the 5-0 drubbing against Southend I decided to come up with Plan B in case we do finish in the bottom 3 of the Championship, and this is it. Long shot I think you'll agree but worth a go all the same.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
